history.proof: intros f h n. split. - intros [Hnone Hnon_empty]. split. + rewrite stream_map_spec. rewrite Hnone. reflexivity. + intros n' Hlt. specialize (Hnon_empty n' Hlt). rewrite stream_map_spec. intro H. apply Hnon_empty. destruct (h n'); congruence. - intros [Hnone_map Hnon_empty_map]. split. + qsimpl time: 1 use: stream_map_spec. + intros n' Hlt. specialize (Hnon_empty_map n' Hlt). intro H. apply Hnon_empty_map. rewrite stream_map_spec. rewrite H. reflexivity.

exceptions.exn: Found no subterm matching "match ?M1961 ?M1962 with | Some a => Some (?M1960 a) | None => None end" in Hnone_map.
No such goal. Focus next goal with bullet +.

original: intros f h n. split. - intros [Hnone Hnon_empty]. split. + rewrite stream_map_spec. rewrite Hnone. reflexivity. + intros n' Hlt. specialize (Hnon_empty n' Hlt). rewrite stream_map_spec. intro H. apply Hnon_empty. destruct (h n'); congruence. - intros [Hnone_map Hnon_empty_map]. split. + rewrite <- stream_map_spec in Hnone_map. auto. + intros n' Hlt. specialize (Hnon_empty_map n' Hlt). intro H. apply Hnon_empty_map. rewrite stream_map_spec. rewrite H. reflexivity.
